entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
